# PazamCount

Ad Mati 

[![xscode](https://img.shields.io/badge/Available%20on-xs%3Acode-blue?style=?style=plastic&logo=appveyor&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://cp.xscode.com/avipars/PazamCount)


No really, count your remaining service days

We use some cool libraries and effects 

Time Ticker
Transparent ToolBar with gradient 
Card View
Notification Channel : PazamOlam_Channel
Icon: ic_stat_onesignal_default
